line_1: And now — alas for unforeseen mishaps!
line_2: They put on a damp night-cap and relapse;

line_1: For pity's sake tells undeserv'd mishaps,
line_2: And their applause to gain, recounts his claps.

line_1: When least she dreamt of such mishaps.
line_2: And when she thought to lick her chaps,

line_1: When least she dreamt of such mishaps.
